title: Молодая кровь
overview: "Molodaya krov'" is a reality show about what is hidden behind the bright wrapper of the life of famous performers and how difficult it is to become a real star and what trials await newcomers on the path to fame.BlackStar Inc. and STS LOVE held an all-Russian casting of future label artists. Out of 2.5 thousand people, after 2 stages of casting, 6 people were selected. They will face difficult tests for a month, as well as classes with the best specialists in the country's music industry. During this period, they will have to record at least 1 track, which they will present at the final reporting concert.Who will join the big BlackStar Inc. family and receive a contract with one of the most successful production centers in the country? Who will become the new black star?
